thread.title: Ground News - YEAR END REVIEW: Union workers lead a successful strike of Thombert, Inc.
thread.title_full: Ground News - YEAR END REVIEW: Union workers lead a successful strike of Thombert, Inc.

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - YEAR END REVIEW: Union workers lead a successful strike of Thombert, Inc.
text:
Summary by Ground News Thombert, Inc. employees and members of the United Auto Workers Local 997 reached an agreement with higher-ups on Oct. 21 after almost three months of picketing. According to the union's Facebook page, the new contract has been signed. When picketing first began, workers were frustrated Thombert,. Inc. had grown leaps and bounds, but their paychecks did not reflect that. Share menu More
Filters 1 Articles 1 Articles All Left Center Right
newtondailynews.com Center High Factuality YEAR END REVIEW: Union workers lead a successful strike of Thombert, Inc. Thombert, Inc. employees and members of the United Auto Workers Local 997 reached an agreement with higher-ups on Oct. 21 after almost three months of picketing. According to the union’s Facebook page, which has been posting frequent updates since August, the new contract has been signed.Representatives of the UAW Local 997 did not immediately respond to phone calls from Newton News by press time, so the contents of the contract remain unknown. …
